Parameters: Runnable: the runnable task requested to be executed
ThreadPoolExecutor: the executor attempting to execute this task
rejectedExecution(java.lang.Runnable,jav.Description: Executes task r in the caller's thread, unless the executor has been shut down, in which case the task is discarded.
rejectedExecution(java.lang.Runnable,jav.FullName: public void rejectedExecution (Runnable r, ThreadPoolExecutor e)

ClassDesc: A handler for rejected tasks that runs the rejected task directly in the calling thread of the execute method, unless the executor has been shut down, in which case the task is discarded.
